title: What It Takes to Run a Successful Multigenerational Team
description: Scott Wilson and Crystal Ho of the Atlas Group discuss the importance of hiring employees who match well in terms of chemistry, dedication, and a willingness to learn.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Scott Wilson and Crystal Ho of the Atlas Group discuss the importance of hiring employees who match well in terms of chemistry, dedication, and a willingness to learn.
